channel.title: How do I fix this?
channel.description:
I'm editing my server.... especially... autospawn.. and so...I compile perfectly.. NO ERRORS... Then, I go, and start server.. and this says....
[code]Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string "9 " at java.lang.NUmberFormatException.forInputString <Unkown Source> at java.lang.Interger.parseInt<Unkown Source> at java.lang.Interger.parseInt<Unkown Source> at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn<NPCHandler.java:1077> at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:1047> at server.main<server.java:100>[/code]

item.title: How do I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @winmx1 winmx1
item.description:
@winmx1 wrote:

spawn = 3200 3334 3903 0 3335 3904 3333 3902 2 NewNPC
^ ^
Those are the only spaces.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2008, 06:34:26 pm[/size][hr]Can someone help me?!? Come on… I need the helppp![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2008, 07:43:44 pm[/size][hr]Come on people… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: How do I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Are you using tabs or spaces.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @winmx1 winmx1
item.description:
@winmx1 wrote:

Zach 93:

You violated the format for Auto spawn, simple. If the auto spawn is being read in 10 blocks, and you only fill in 9, a NumberFormatException will be thrown.

This is my format…
// NpcID CoordX CoordY Height RangeX1 RangeY1 RangeX2 RangeY2 WalkType Descrption
spawn = 494 3010 3353 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker – East

This is the format… all my spawned NPC’s are like this

[code]// NpcID CoordX CoordY Height RangeX1 RangeY1 RangeX2 RangeY2 WalkType Descrption

You violated the format for Autospawn, simple. If the autospawn is being read in 10 blocks, and you only fill in 9, a NumberFormatException will be thrown.
